Jume 3,2024Minnesota Department of Commerce85 7th Place East, Suite 280Saint Paul, MN 55101Main Office: 651-539-1500Complaints: 651-539-1600Energy Information: 800-657-3710Dear Sirs,My husband and I had this property powered up 50 years ago. In 2018 our MP+L budget plan was $85.00/month. In 2021 it was$120.00/month. It has been $151.00/month since 2021.Please note the charges for fuel or solar or wind. Also rate Adjustments and Low income (Government subsidized), and service fees(to handle autopay?), and policy adjustments. This has gotten out of hand!Keep in mind that this rate increase is being placed after the warmest Minnesota winter on record. After they became a member of theAllete Energy System on the stock market our rates took a hit, and now they want to have a Canadian pension company as aninvestor. My bank won't even accept Canadian quarters. What is this really going to do to our rates?Sincerely,Gale Claesson4836 Butler RoadIron, MN 55751Sale Cluerson

Additional Info: TRANSCRIPT OF PUC PROCEEDING ON ALLETE ACQUISITION ANNOUNCEMENT
